channel.title: Home on LeeLab
channel.description: Recent content in Home on LeeLab

item.title: About
item.description: LeeLab focuses on developing statistical analysis methods for neuroscience and mental health data science. Journal Club Meeting Every Friday 9:30-10:30am, ARB R202 Conference room Paper list

item.title: Projects
item.description: On-going projects. Post-selection inference Sparse mediation/moderated mediation analysis Using CR-RANN. Function-on-scalar regression Using WHICAP. Measurement error model with high-dimensional longitudinal predictors With Dr. Park in NYU. Past Projects
